name: Hive Havoc
description:
The final 3D FPS Project for CAS 117.

Modifications:

- You can now sprint by holding shift.

- Death is now better indicated to the player.

- Changed the doors so they now open on killing a certain number of monsters. Approach the door to find out how many more are needed.

Created by Nova Tolmoff with tutorials and assets provided by Michigan State University
